WESTERN SOUTH ATLANTIC.
DNC 01.
1. SURVEY OPERATIONS IN PROGRESS UNTIL 18 FEB
   BY BGP CHALLENGER TOWING ONE 12000 METER LONG CABLE
   IN AREA BOUND BY
   27-00S 045-29W, 27-06S 045-39W,
   27-13S 045-40W, 27-15S 045-47W,
   27-31S 045-26W, 27-51S 045-41W,
   27-53S 045-35W, 27-51S 044-57W,
   27-52S 044-46W, 27-50S 044-39W,
   27-51S 044-36W, 27-56S 044-12W.
   WIDE BERTH REQUESTED.
2. CANCEL HYDROLANT 397/18.
3. CANCEL THIS MSG 19 FEB 18.
